title: shrI mangaLAmbikE
sahitya:
shrI mangaLAmbikE shrI vAnchIsha nAyikE cintitArtha dAyikE shrI shivE samrakSa mAm


caraNam   sOma viDambana sundara vadanE sura nara munigaNa sukhakara nayanE kOmaLatara guruguha nuta caranE 
kOTi sUrya prakAsha kOTi rAdyAbharaNE shyAmaLA kOla vadanAdi shakti samyuta cakra bharanE kamEshvari 
kaca vijita ghanE kalyANi cidAnanda ghanE kAma kaLE kambu jaya gaLE karakamalE sakaLa niSkaLE
